metadata.title: USN-6003-1 -- Emacs vulnerability
metadata.description: Xi Lu discovered that Emacs did not properly handle certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary commands.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6003-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  emacs24-bin-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 emacs24-lucid - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 emacs24 - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 emacs24-el - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 emacs24-nox - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 emacs24-common - 24.5+1-6ubuntu1.1+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
